body_html:
I checked the tpu example you provided. It seems that 'tf.estimator.RunConfig' could not take a parameter named 'cluster' whose type is 'ClusterResolver' like ' tf.contrib.tpu.RunConfig' does.

Do you mean I should write some code to make 'tf.estimator.RunConfig' take a parameter named 'cluster' ? which may be similar to 'tf.contrib.tpu.RunConfig' and 'tf.contrib.tpu.TPUEstimator'.

Thanks.

body:
I checked the tpu example you provided. It seems that 'tf.estimator.RunConfig' could not take a parameter named 'cluster' whose type is 'ClusterResolver' like ' tf.contrib.tpu.RunConfig' does.
